refnamediv.refpurpose: Build store derivations on target machines in a network

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command disnix-build builds derivations on the given target machines specified in a distributed derivation XML file. When the building process is complete, the results are transfered back to the coordinator machine, so that they are kept for further use and do not have to be rebuilt again in case of a configuration change.
In most cases this command should not be called directly. The command disnix-env automatically uses this command if the --build-on-targets is specified.
